title: Ultra Audio Ripper
description:
Ultra Audio Ripper


Do you want to put your favourite moive or TV shows into your iPod? 
Now you can do this with Ultra Audio Ripper. It can convert major video file format 
like WMV, AVI, MPG, ASF, DVD VOB and RM into audio only MP3 files playable by portable MP3 players!

Key Benefits:
Batch extract audio from various video files to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave.

Ultra Audio Ripper is the fast and affordable solution for converting Video to audio mp3.
With Ultra Audio Ripper you can put all your favorite movies in your pocket and listening to them anywhere.

Ultra Audio Ripper is the easiest-to-use video converter software for ripping audio from video. It can convert almost all video format, e.g. AVI, XviD, MOV,QT, rm, rmvb, DAT, MPEG, WMV, Divx to audio format like mp3, ogg and wav. It is also a powerful mp3 converter with fast conversion speed.
And Ultra Audio Ripper can convert almost all kinds of video files such as rm, divx, xvid, avi, wmv, asf, mpg, mpeg, vob, mov, qt, vcd, svcd to mp3 format.

Extremely easy to use interface for any computer users.
Ultra Audio Ripper has an easy to use UI. You can click "Add File" button to add the Video files you want to convert or directly drag Video files from explorer to the Video list. For example, you can do a search on *.avi in your explorer, and drag them into Ultra Audio Ripper in a second. 

Highlight Features:
Convert video files to audio files like mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support MPG, DVD VOB, ASF, WMV ,AVI and RM
Convert video to mp3 in batch mode
Easy to use UI design. Support drag drop.
Support wmv , asf to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support mov , qt to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support rm , rmvb to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support mpg , mpeg , vob ,vcd , svcd to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support avi , divx , xvid to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Support many predefined profile setting for mp3, ogg and wave.
Support 3gp, 3gpp, 3g2, mp4 to mp3, mp4, wma, 3gp, aiff, au, ogg, wave
Designed for Windows 98, XP and Vista. Need realplayer installed for better Real Media support.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Extract with Winrar.
Run keygen.
Copy serial to the installed app. Input any registration name.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!!
